item.majruszs_accessories.giant_seed.ite: Gives a chance to double the loot from the crops.
item.majruszs_accessories.lucky_rock.ite: Gives a chance for extra loot when mining.
item.majruszs_accessories.idol_of_fertil: Gives a chance of having twins after breeding two animals.
item.majruszs_accessories.taming_certifi: All the animals you tame will be empowered.
Right click on the animal for more information about attributes.
item.majruszs_accessories.secret_ingredi: Makes all potions stronger and last longer.
Right click on the brewing stand to enhance all potions.
The amplifier and duration of all potions have been improved.
